TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit Control/ControlAccessibleObject extends System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject

summary.span: 提供有关辅助功能应用程序可使用的控件的信息。

span.span: Provides information about a control that can be used by an accessibility application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 窗体内置了辅助功能支持，并提供了有关应用程序的信息，使其能够使用具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序。Windows Forms has accessibility support built in, and provides information about your application that enables it to work with accessibility client applications. 辅助功能客户端应用程序的示例包括：屏幕弱视和审阅者实用程序、语音输入实用程序、屏幕键盘、备用输入设备和键盘增强实用程序。Examples of accessibility client applications are: screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities. 有时，你将需要向具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序提供其他信息。Sometimes you will want to provide additional information to accessibility client applications. 提供此附加信息的方法有两种。There are two ways of providing this additional information. 若要为现有控件提供有限的辅助功能信息，请设置控件的 、、和 属性值，这些值将报告给具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序。To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's , , , and property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications. 或者，如果你需要将更多辅助功能信息包含在控件中，则可以编写自己的派生自 或 类的类。Alternatively, if you require more accessibility information to be included with your control, you can write your own class deriving from the or classes. 例如，如果你正在编写自己的控件，而该控件不是从公共控件派生的，或者需要在控件中进行命中测试，则应通过调用 方法为控件创建 。For example, if you are writing your own control that is not derived from the common controls or you require such operations as hit testing within your control, you should create a for your control by calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果重写 方法，则还必须重写 方法。If you override the method, you must also override the method. 若要获取或设置 属性，必须添加对安装了 .NET Framework 的 `Accessibility` 程序集的引用。To get or set the property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework. 有关辅助性对象的更多信息，请参见 MSDN Library 中的“Active Accessibility”部分。For more information about accessible objects, see the Active Accessibility section of the MSDN Library. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个从 类派生的复选框控件，并创建一个自定义 以便派生类使用。The following code example creates a check box control that derives from the class and creates a custom for the derived class to use. 默认情况下，派生类 `MyCheckBox` ，因此它显示为一个切换按钮。The derived class, `MyCheckBox`, has an of by default so it appears as a toggle button. 派生 类 `MyCheckBoxControlAccessibleObject`会重写三个属性，以考虑外观上的差异。The derived class, `MyCheckBoxControlAccessibleObject`, overrides three properties to account for the difference in appearance. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject/CPP/controlaccessibility.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject/CS/controlaccessibility.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject/VB/controlaccessibility.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将标识符传递到 `fileName` 参数指定的 WinHelp 文件，以标识所需的帮助主题。Pass the identifier to the WinHelp file specified by the `fileName` parameter to identify the desired Help topic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必须为每个 对象调用 方法，这些客户端应用程序将收到通知。You must call the method for each object the accessibility client applications are to be notified of. 当设置属性或从事件处理程序中设置属性时，通常会调用 方法。The method is typically called when a property is set or from within an event handler. 例如，你可以调用 方法，并传入 事件的事件处理程序中的 `Hide` 的 值。For example, you might call the method and pass in an value of `Hide` from within the event handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了使此方法生效，控件必须实现 接口，并且其 `LiveSetting` 属性必须返回 或 。For this method to be effective, the control must implement the interface, and its `LiveSetting` property must return either or . 此外，应用程序必须重新编译为目标 .NET Framework 4.8 或使用兼容性开关选择使用此功能。In addition, the application must be recompiled to target .NET Framework 4.8 or opt in to this feature by using compatibility switches.

exception.span: 所有者控件不是活动区域。
